article: Strange things happen to time when you travel. _ the earth is divided into24 time zones, one hour apart, you can have days with _ or fewer than 24 hours, and weeks with more or fewer than seven days. If you _ a five-day trip across the Atlantic Ocean, your _ enters a different time zone every _ . As you enter each zone, the time _ one hour. Traveling west, you set your clock back; traveling east, you set it _ . Each day of your trip has _ 25 or 23 hours. If you travel by ship across the Pacific, you _ the internationaldate line. By agreement, this is the point _ a new day begins. _ you cross the line, you change your _ one full day, backward _ forward. Traveling east, today _ yesterday; traveling west, _ is tomorrow!
